description: Numbers n such that sum of divisors of n is a fourth power.
references: J.-M. De Koninck, Ces nombres qui nous fascinent, Entry 217, p. 62, Ellipses, Paris 2008.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) c=0; for(n=1, 8240486, if(ispower(sigma(n), 4), c++; write("b019422.txt", c " " n))) /* _Donovan Johnson_, Jun 13 2013 */
author: _David W. Wilson_
